column1: Art Institute of Chicago//// It costs $12 for adults to visit
column2: but entry is free on Thursday evenings from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. The new Modern Wing (designed by starchitect Renzo Piano
column3: as noted) isn't quite completed yet (scheduled to open in May 2009)
column4: but it should be a fantastic addition
column5: both to the outstanding architecture of Chicago and to the museum itself.
